resp = client.indices.create(
    index="test",
    mappings={
        "dynamic": False,
        "properties": {
            "text": {
                "type": "text"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="test",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "text": "words words",
        "flag": "bar"
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.index(
    index="test",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "text": "words words",
        "flag": "foo"
    },
)
print(resp2)

resp3 = client.indices.put_mapping(
    index="test",
    properties={
        "text": {
            "type": "text"
        },
        "flag": {
            "type": "text",
            "analyzer": "keyword"
        }
    },
)
print(resp3)
